title: What is MyHealthfinder?
cleaned_text: What is MyHealthfinder? Trusted information to help your family stay healthy. Make sure your family is up to date on preventive services. Explore health topics Health Conditions [Cancer](/myhealthfinder/health-conditions/cancer) Find out about the steps you can take to help prevent cancer. [Diabetes](/myhealthfinder/health-conditions/diabetes) You can do a lot to lower your risk for type 2 diabetes — get started now. [Heart Health](/myhealthfinder/health-conditions/heart-health) Take steps to lower your risk of heart problems — like checking your blood pressure regularly. Doctor Visits [Regular Checkups](/myhealthfinder/doctor-visits/regular-checkups) Stay on top of your health - get regular checkups with a doctor or nurse. [Screening Tests](/myhealthfinder/doctor-visits/screening-tests) Find out which screenings (medical tests) you may need this year. [Vaccines (Shots)](/myhealthfinder/doctor-visits/vaccines-shots) Vaccines aren't just for kids! Find out why everyone in the family needs to get important vaccines. Healthy Living [Mental Health and Relationships](/myhealthfinder/healthy-living/mental-health-and-relationships) Get tips on things like managing stress and talking to loved ones about important health topics. [Nutrition](/myhealthfinder/healthy-living/nutrition) Making small changes to your eating habits can make a big difference for your health. Find out how to get started. [Physical Activity](/myhealthfinder/healthy-living/physical-activity) Regular physical activity is good for your health. Get tips to help you get more active. Pregnancy [Doctor and Midwife Visits](/myhealthfinder/pregnancy/doctor-and-midwife-visits) Find out how your doctor or midwife can help you have a healthy pregnancy. [Nutrition and Physical Activity](/myhealthfinder/pregnancy/nutrition-and-physical-activity) Eating healthy and staying active can help you have a healthy pregnancy — and a healthy baby.
